description: This file defines the UserController class in a Laravel application, handling user-related API endpoints such as listing users, updating profiles, verifying admin users, and managing user roles like managers and coordinators.

classes.name: UserController
classes.description: Controller class managing user-related API endpoints, including user CRUD operations, role management, and authentication verification.

methods.name: index
methods.description: Retrieves all users based on request parameters.

methods.name: store
methods.description: Creates a new user based on request data.

methods.name: getUserData
methods.description: Retrieves data for the current user.

methods.name: verifyAdminUser
methods.description: Verifies if the current user is an admin by password check.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates user information identified by ID.

methods.name: updateProfile
methods.description: Updates the profile of the current user.

methods.name: deleteManagerCoordinator
methods.description: Deletes a manager coordinator by ID.

methods.name: deactivateManagerCoordinator
methods.description: Deactivates a manager coordinator by ID.

methods.name: activateManagerCoordinator
methods.description: Activates a manager coordinator by ID.
